item.title: Svelte Button Configuration Guide: States, Styles, and Accessibility
item.description: Build reusable buttons in Svelte: dynamic classes, optional chaining and nullish coalescing, safe defaults, state-driven styles, accessibility, testing, and common pitfalls.
